2072.subject: HPWE
2072.descrlong: Covers the business of selling sport in our society.  Explores the nuances of the sport business industry, sport management, and sport marketing.  Describes and discusses the marketing mix: the strategic combination of four elements - product, price, place, and promotion - and segmentation, targeting, and positon in the sport business. (Offered as interest warrants.)
